thread.title: Great food and wait staff - Review
thread.title_full: Great food and wait staff - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vicki G
title: Great food and wait staff - Review
text: The wait staff in the 5th floor restaurant are very friendly and helpful. The food was very, very good! Even during the blizzard on 3/21 the food was excellent and the wait staff very positive. The location of the hotel is excellent! Close to the subway and so much to do!
